components.description:
Fully Heat Treated Post-Welding
Double Butted Top Tube & Down Tube 

Externally Machined Campy 

Compatible Integrated Headtube 

Mid Bottom Bracket 

Cutout Seat Tube for Large Tire Clearance 

Externally Machined 73mm Wide Bottom Bracket 

Integrated Seat Clamp 

14mm Axle Slots 

5mm Thick Dropouts 

Seatpost Diameter: 27.2mm 

Ovalized Chainstays 

Weight: 5.95lbs
